name.ja: <ruby>大<rt>だい</rt></ruby><ruby>行<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>進<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>前<rt>ぜん</rt></ruby><ruby>夜<rt>や</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Reveal 1 Level 7 or higher Beast Type monster in your hand.

effect.en: Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck. You can Special Summon up to 2 excavated Level 4 or lower Beast Type monsters to your field in face-down Defense Position. Send the remaining cards to the Graveyard.
